Name: Blessed Work
About the game: A new work appears, but for some reason the lack of security is everywhere, place objects, activate buttons, move things and do everything in your power to prevent your workers from dying trying to finish the construction in this lemmings-style game! 50 stages with more than 10 mechanics! Different ways to beat each stage! 4 Items to place in the environment!
